wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: name
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Required.. The name of the input, which is submitted with the form data.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: id
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Required. Must be unique. The id of the input

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: value
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Optional initial value of the input

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: classes
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Classes to add to the file upload component.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: required
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: If true, file upload is required/must be filled out. Defaults to false.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: disabled
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: If true, file upload should be disabled. Defaults to false.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: question
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Text for the question component relating to the file upload.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: hint
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Options for the hint component (e.g. text). See hint options below.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Optional id attribute to add to the hint span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentHTML is set, this is not required. Text to use within the hint. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. If contentText is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the hint. If contentHTML is provided, the contentText argument will be ignored.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the hint span tag.

wmndsFileUploaderProps.name: formGroup
wmndsFileUploaderProps.description: Options for the form-group wrapper See formGroup below.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)
